question: Who among the following Karkota dynasty ruler defeated Yasovarman (King of Kannauj) in 740 AD
explanation: In 740 AD, Lalitaditya Muktapida defeated Yasovarman (King of Kannauj), the successor to the emperor Harsha. He was also able to crush the Turks, Tibetans, Bhutias, Kambojas and others.
